Tanpa Mekanisme Pansel, Presiden Jaring Anggota Dewas KPK
01 Nov 2019, 16:34 by Pradipta Rahadi


Tanpa Mekanisme Pansel, Presiden Jaring Anggota Dewas KPK

KBRN, Jakarta : Presiden Joko Widodo menuturkan, bahwa dirinya masih mengumpulkan masukan terkait siapa saja yang dapat mengisi posisi di Dewan Pengawas KPK. Selain itu, Kepala Negara juga menghargai proses hukum uji materi Undang-Undang KPK yang tengah berjalan di Mahkamah Konstitusi.Pembentukan Dewan Pengawas Komisi Pemberantasan Korupsi (KPK) sudah dalam proses penjaringan personil. bahkan untuk pertama kalinya, pengangkatan anggota Dewan Pengawas KPK tidak melalui mekanisme panitia seleksi. meski demikian, Kepala Negara meyakini bahwa para tokoh yang dipiluh sebagai Dewan Pengawas KPK merupakan para tokoh yang memiliki kredibilitas baik. Hal itu diutarakan Presiden Jokowi dalam acara bincang santai dengan wartawan di Meja Oval Istana Merdeka pada Jumat petang. "Masih dalam proses mendapatkan masukan siapa yang bisa duduk disitu. pelantikannya akan bersamaan dengan pengambilan sumpah Komisioner KPK bulan Desember. Untuk pertama kalinya, tidak pakai Pansel, tapi percaya lah, nanti yang terpilih ini mereka yang punya kredibilitas terbaik." Jelas Presiden di Istana Merdeka, Jumat (01/11/19). Selain itu, terkait banyaknya permintaan agar dikeluarkannya Peraturan Pemerintah UU KPK, Presiden menyebutkan bahwa dirinya menghargai proses hukum uji materi Undang-Undang KPK yang tengah berjalan di Mahkamah Konstitusi. Menurutnya, ada sopan santun dalam ketatanegaraan yang tidak boleh dipandang sebelah mata. "Masih ada proses uji materi di MK. Kita hargai itu. Jangan langsung ditimpa dengan Perppu. Ada sopan santun dalam ketatanegaraan. Hargai itu." Tambah Presiden. Seperti diketahui, Badan Legislasi Dewan Perwakilan Rakyat (DPR) bersama Pemerintah sebelumnya menyepakati pembentukan Dewan Pengawas KPK, namun sempat beda pendapat mengenai pihak yang berwenang mengangkat anggota Dewan Pengawas.Pada akhirnya, dalam rapat Baleg beberapa waktu lalu, disepakati wewenang mengangkat anggota Dewan Pengawas KPK di tangan presiden. Hal ini terkait dengan fungsi KPK pada ranah eksekutif meskipun lembaganya bersifat independen dan tidak di bawah pemerintah. (PR)

Without the Pansel Mechanism, the President Nets a member of the KPK Dewas
Nov 01 2019, 16:34 by Pradipta Rahadi


Without the Pansel Mechanism, the President Nets a member of the KPK Dewas

KBRN, Jakarta: President Joko Widodo said that he was still gathering input on who could fill the position on the KPK Supervisory Board. In addition, the Head of State also appreciates the legal process of judicial review of the KPK Law which is currently underway at the Constitutional Court. The establishment of the Corruption Eradication Commission (KPK) Supervisory Board is already in the process of screening personnel. even for the first time, the appointment of members of the KPK Supervisory Board did not go through the selection committee mechanism. however, the Head of State believes that the figures chosen as the KPK Supervisory Board are figures who have good credibility. This was stated by President Jokowi in a casual talk show with reporters at the Oval Table of the Merdeka Palace on Friday evening. "It is still in the process of getting input on who can sit there. The inauguration will coincide with the taking of the oath of the KPK Commissioner in December. For the first time, do not use Pansel, but believe, the chosen ones will have the best credibility." Obviously the President at the Merdeka Palace, Friday (01/11/19). In addition, related to the many requests for the issuance of Government Regulations on the KPK Law, the President stated that he respected the legal process for judicial review of the KPK Law which was under way at the Constitutional Court. According to him, there are manners in the state administration that should not be underestimated. "There is still a material testing process at the Constitutional Court. We appreciate that. Don't overwrite it directly with Perppu. There are manners in the administration. Appreciate that." Add President. As is known, the Legislative Body of the House of Representatives (DPR) with the Government previously agreed on the formation of the KPK Supervisory Board, but there was a difference of opinion regarding the authorities who appointed members of the Supervisory Board. In the end, at the Baleg meeting some time ago, it was agreed upon the authority to appoint members of the KPK Supervisory Board in the hands of the president. This is related to the function of the KPK in the executive domain even though the institution is independent and not under the government. (PR)
